tool_description: Uses the Winget database to fetch informations. Updated every 3 hours.
title: Winget API

api_list.name: Get software informations
api_list.description: This will give you informations about the software version, license and more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://winget-api.p.rapidapi.com/package"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "winget-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get complete package list
api_list.description: Get all available packages in database by ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://winget-api.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "winget-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://winget-api.p.rapidapi.com/package"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "winget-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
